metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24998 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache Commons FileUpload before 1.5 does not limit the number of request parts to be processed resulting in the possibility of an attacker triggering a DoS with a malicious upload or series of uploads. Note that, like all of the file upload limits, the new configuration option (FileUploadBase#setFileCountMax) is not enabled by default and must be explicitly configured.

criterions.comment: libcommons-fileupload-java package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
